content: > **please note ** the graph 1 for this > pattern is free to view in its > entirety on my blog this ad-free > downloadable pdf enables me to be able > to bring you more free patterns in the > future go to the free graph here 2 **description ** bring a calm and joyful landscape in doors with this fun and easy bottom up wall hanging design this pattern is worked in row from the bottom up using a bobbin method to change colors keep your yarn attached to the skein the whole pattern is made in single_crochet so just change on the final pull through and leave the carried yarn along the back to help make your finished piece nice and clean i hope you like this pattern this pdf includes both the graph and the written instructions the viewable pattern on divinedebris com only includes the graph the sample in the photos was made in hue + me yarn you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2023 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/the-painted-hills-wall-hanging-free-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/ 2 https //divinedebris com/the-painted-hills-wall-hanging-free-crochet-pattern-by-divine-debris/
